title: Is Indiana Jones Getting Delayed?!
description:
We still don't have a date and the year is almost over! 

Will we see it this year from Xbox? From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jOArXkcBgIw  

Go to http://KindaFunny.com/MonsterHunterNow to play right now!

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
